snippet: The Worker Defense Project receives about 500 complaints a year, largely from immigrant workers. Here are a few that were brought to the office in July.
abstract: Workers Defense Project in Texas receives about 500 complaints a year, largely from immigrant workers; sampling of cases are presented from July 2013.
lead_paragraph: The Worker Defense Project receives about 500 complaints a year, largely from immigrant workers. Here are a few that were brought to the office in July.
